1.0.name: wordpress/wp-tinyforum-widget
1.0.description: tinyForum is a simple and lightweight forum built using the tinyPHP MVC Framework. With this widget, you can display a set number of recent topics from a tinyForum installation. If you would like to integrate your members with tinyForum, I suggest checking out the External Database Authentication Reloaded plugin.
